message: I'll give you a good start, let's see what you do next!
I think we can both do better than that. Let's split it more evenly, and we can both get a good chunk of money.
You said we could do better, so I'm making a more even split. Your turn again!
Let's just split it down the middle. We're both losing value with each round, so we can both maximize our gains with an even split.
